question: I have put in Barrett's Esoph. at random. I don't know the name of my problem. Perhaps you should have a category labeled "Don't Know" or "Unsure".  I've begun to burp quite frequently.  Not much heartburn really, not much flatulence.  Frequent urination (but not much of it), just a frequent feeling of "need to go". I have type 2 diabetes. Maybe 10lbs or so overweight.  Taking cholesterol and hypertension meds, but numbers are good.  6.6 A1C...average daily sugar tests: 130Kate
title: frequent belching
